error.missmatch: Email and password do not match

AuthenticateEmail.title: Authenticate Your Account
AuthenticateEmail.description_1: Protecting your account is our top priority. Please confirm your activity by clicking the magic sent to your email:
AuthenticateEmail.description_2: We have sent an email to the given address, in case it was not yet registered. It may take a minute to receive your code.

AuthenticateOtp.title: Authenticate Your Account
AuthenticateOtp.description: Protecting your account is our top priority. Please confirm your activity by entering code from your authenticator app

Authorize.title: You are being redirected, please wait....
Authorize.description: If you are not redirected in few seconds, please click this button

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.description: Please enter your email address to request a password reset verification link.
ForgotPassword.label: Email
ForgotPassword.verification_text: We have just sent you a verification link to reset the password to email and continue to reset the password.

password_alert.title: Password Exposed
password_alert.description: Your password was exposed by a data breach on the Internet. Continuing to use this password can lead to Unauthorized access to your account.
password_alert.list_1: Add more words that are less common
password_alert.list_2: If you use this password elsewhere, you should change it
password_alert.read_more_explanation: Our checks ensure your password is strong and unique. Rest assured, your password remains private and is never shared with external services.

SignUp.title: Please Choose What Type of Account That You Want to Create

hacker.title: Hacker Sign Up
hacker.subtitle: Hacker Details
hacker.legal: I have read and accepted the all sites

company.title: Company Sign Up
company.subtitle: Company Details
company.legal: I have read and accepted the all sites

Reactivate.title: Reactivate Account
Reactivate.content_lists_1: On {date}, your account will no longer possible to be restored if it was accidentally or wrongfully deactivated.
Reactivate.content_lists_2: By clicking “Yes, reactivate”, you will halt the deactivation process and reactivate your account.
